entry.title: WIND WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 3:52 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 8.3°C
Wind: SE 43 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers near noon. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except southeast 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm except 60 mm near Zeballos and Tahsis. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
